title: If a mixture of milk and water contains milk and water in the ratio 7:2, as mixture contains milk and water in the ratio 5:3, in what ratio should the two mixtures be mixed so that the ratio of water & milk becomes 3:7? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, find LCM of 9 (7+2),8(5+3) and 10(3+7) It is 360 Now make equivalent fractions using 360 7:2 = 280:80 5:3 = 225:135 7:3 = 252:108 Let the fraction of Ist mixture used = X Fraction of the other mixture = 1-X Now 280X + 1-X (225) = 252 X = 0.4909 (fraction of the 1st mixture ) 1-X = 0.5091 ( fraction of the 2nd mixture)
